items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anygrid: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

items.content_html: A lightweight and easy-to-use Minesweeper game library in JavaScript. Customize the grid size, mine count, and difficulty with minimal setup. Perfect for integrating Minesweeper into your web projects or for building your own game.
items.title: yangsnapify/minesweeper-js: A lightweight and easy-to-use Minesweeper game library in JavaScript. Customize the grid size, mine count, and difficulty with minimal setup. Perfect for integrating Minesweeper into your web projects or for building your own game.

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.
items.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.

items.content_html: Overview This ToDo project is a Node.js application that allows users to manage files efficiently. The application provides functionality to add, remove, and list files. It's a simple and lightweight solution for managing tasks or files in a terminal-based environment.
items.title: rajmukeshjii/To-Do-File-Manager: Overview  This ToDo project is a Node.js application that allows users to manage files efficiently. The application provides functionality to add, remove, and list files. It's a simple and lightweight solution for managing tasks or files in a terminal-based environment.

items.content_html: 七圣召唤 Lite，「原神」同人游戏。相比原版「七圣召唤」，具有轻量化、高自由度等特点。 ／ GITCG Lite is a "Genshin Impact" Doujin game. It is lightweight and highly customizable compared to the original game.
